node.title: Jury reaches verdict in case of alleged British ISIS member
node.description: El Shafee Elsheikh is one of three British men accused in brutal ISIS hostage-taking scheme that led to the deaths of four Americans.
node.content: ["A federal jury in Virginia has reached a verdict in the case of El Shafee Elsheikh, one of the three British men accused of operating a brutal ISIS hostage-taking scheme that led to the deaths of four Americans.\u00a0", "Collectively known as the \"Beatles\" for their British accents, Elsheikh and his co-conspirators Mohammed Emwazi and Alexanda Kotey worked together to kidnap and abuse more than two dozen Western hostages, according to prosecutors. He's charged with participating in the plot that led to the deaths of American hostages James Foley, Peter Kassig, Kayla Mueller and Steven Sotloff.", "Elsheikh was not accused of carrying out the act of killing the hostages himself, but was charged with participating in the kidnapping and torture that led to the murders of the hostages.\u00a0", "This is a developing story and will be updated."]
